title: Workshop on Strengthening Consistency in Outcome-Based Science Curriculum Design

context.prior_knowledge: Over 5 years of practical experience in science fields and understanding of basic instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented program designed to strengthen workplace relevance for current professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 85% curriculum consistency by aligning Course Learning Outcomes (CLOs) and Program Learning Outcomes (PLOs) using a matrix.
Learners can conduct performance-based instructional design by applying weighted distribution principles of assessment items and Teaching Units (TUs) in a simulation environment.
Learners can identify underrepresented issues in specific PLOs and propose improvement plans through VR-based analysis.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
